channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks haven’t been this expensive relative to bonds in almost 25 years. Is a market downturn next?
item.description: Investors should position for a new global order with high-quality bonds that pay, according to Pimco.

item.title: This move by Trump could be ‘disastrous’ for the mortgage market and drive up costs for home buyers even more

item.title: Folgers coffee, Jif peanut butter parent aims to absorb some tariff costs for shoppers
item.description: Smucker wants to keep prices as low as possible as its revenue outlook more closely matches Wall Street analyst estimates than its profit view.

item.title: Weight-loss drugs are an issue for McDonald’s, but here’s the bigger problem

item.title: Almost everything you’ve read about the Trump-Musk feud is probably wrong
item.description: Elon Musk has embarked on one bold move in distancing himself — and thereby Tesla — from Trump and the MAGA brand.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
